cause.description:
We were born with natural rights. The right to live The right to love The right to choice The right to have a fucking voice
1. The governments of the world have no right to limit your natural rights.
2. Everyone is equal and should be treated that way.
3. It's your body, you should do to it what you want
cause.mission: To give all people the natural rights that they were born with.
cause.name: Natural Rights
